name: BrainFried
description:
Live the ultimate student experience in this cooperative puzzle game where mutual aid and anxiety go hand in hand, for better or for worse.

Information booklet: Click here

Installation instructions

2 players required

Game Setup :

1. Open Steam and login into your account.

2. Execute BrainFried.exe

3. The host player must select the “Play” then the “Host” button and start the game by selecting “Create game”.

4. The second player must click the “Join” button and select the game which has the same name as the one created by the host player.

P.S. It is important that you are logged into Steam before executing BrainFried.exe. If the game was launched before being logged into Steam, it must be closed and reopened after successfully logging into your Steam account.
